artist: Maker: M. Goné Dre Kobena Paul
creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: tie-dyed dark blue ground with yellow horizontal stripes and light blue veined circular pattern at center with bands of small irregular diamonds throughout; fringe on short ends
dimension: 42 1/2 x 58 1/2 in. (107.95 x 148.59 cm) (irregular, without fringe)
markings: \'From Gambia/s/p oum\'e/Côte d\'Ivorie/1999\', in black ink, on front of tag, tied to corner of fringe; \'Moneganen/(Stars)2.\', in black ink, on back of tag
title: Woman's wrapper
